bill.title: Counties; authorize to use excess funds to purchase land of delinquent ad valorem taxpayer.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 19-9-29, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize The Board Of Supervisors Of Any County To Use Excess Funds To Purchase The Land Of Any Delinquent Tax Payer For The Whole Amount Of Taxes Due And All Costs Incident To The Sale Of Such Land, If No Person Will Bid And Pay For The Whole Amount Of Taxes And All Costs Incident To The Sale; To Amend Section 27-41-59, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That If No Person Or The Board Of Supervisors Will Bid For The Land Of A Delinquent Tax Payer And Pay The Whole Amount Of Taxes And All Costs Incident To The Tax Sale, The Tax Collector Shall Strike It Off To The State; To Amend Sections 19-9-29, 27-41-59, 19-3-41, 27-43-1, 27-45-1, 27-45-3, 27-45-13, 27-45-15, 27-45-23, 27-41-2, 27-41-65, 27-41-67, 27-41-69, 27-41-73, 27-41-79, 27-41-81 And 27-41-83, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Conform To The Preceding Sections; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To County Affairs;Ways and Means
